newsitem.title: USA: ParcPlace-Digitalk sees Q2 loss, Q3 charge.
newsitem.headline: ParcPlace-Digitalk sees Q2 loss, Q3 charge.

text.p: ParcPlace Digitalk Inc said it expects to report a second quarter loss per share between $0.35 and $0.45, excluding one-time costs of $3.0 million relating to Objectshare Systems Inc acquisition.
The company estimates revenues of between $10.0 and $10.5 million for the quarter, which will be reported October 28.

ParcPlace-Digitalk also said it plans several cost reduction activities in the near future, including cutting its headcount by about 20 percent. It said it will take a net charge against third fiscal quarter results for severance, facilities and write-offs of excess assets.

A company spokesperson was not immediately available for comment. According to First Call, analysts' mean second quarter estimate was for the company to report a second quarter loss of $0.16 per share versus a loss of $0.35 a share a year ago, excluding a charge of $0.49 a share.
For the year-ago third quarter, the company reported net income of $0.01 a share.
A company spokeswoman said that the company currently employs between 335 and 340 people.
